exhibits.title: Black Canvas
exhibits.shortStatement: A gritty black-and-white collection built on street energy and sharp fashion presence—minimal, raw, and cinematic.

exhibits.title: Random Beautiful Things
exhibits.shortStatement: A celebration of chance: small, unplanned moments that become photographs—wind, movement, light, and timing turning into story.
